name: Tiki Time
description:
It's Tiki Time!

You are a short order chef working in a tropical resort kitchen. The island guests are hungry for snacks and drinks! Serve them as quick as possible before they leave!

Keyboard:
WASD  = move
left mouse click and hold  = pick up / drop item

Controllers:
left stick = move
A (hold / release) = pick up / drop item
